title: Board Level Bug?
body: Hi, my in-game summoner level and board level are currently 33, but for some reason, the level 7 restriction for "Concepts & Creations" still apply. I was wondering if this is a bug, and if so, how could I fix it? Thanks in advance! :D

replies.body: Yea it's just a small issue with boards levels every now and then. You can either post here in H&S to update it, or simply use the Syncing Tool stickied up top!
